  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205368</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Business of Art: Klein International String Competition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Geschäft der kunst: Klein 
Internationale Zeichenkette-Konkurrenz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les affaires de l'art : Concurrence 
Internationale de Chaîne de caractères de Klein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O negócio da arte: Competição 
Internacional Da Corda De Klein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio di arte: Concorrenza 
Internazionale Della Stringa Di Klein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επιχείρηση της τέχνης: Διεθνής ανταγωνισμός 
συμβολοσειράς Klein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El negocio del arte: Competición 
Internacional De la Cadena De Klein</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK charts the progress of the young competitors in the 2003 Irving M. Klein International String Competition as they vie for the $10,000 grand prize and a series of prestigious concerts. This Educator Guide traces the history of stringed instruments as well as the history of string competitions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN entwirft den Fortschritt der jungen 
Konkurrenten in der Irving M. Klein International 
Zeichenkette-Konkurrenz 2003, während sie für $10.000 großartigen 
prize vie und eine Reihe prestigevolle Konzerte. Dieser Erzieher, 
den Anleitung die Geschichte von nachvollzieht, stringed Instrumente 
sowie die Geschichte der Zeichenkettekonkurrenzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE dresse une carte le progrès des 
jeunes concurrents en concurrence 2003 de chaîne de caractères 
d'Irving M. Klein International pendant qu'ils luttent pour les 
$10.000 professionnels grands et des séries de concerts prestigieux. 
Cet éducateur que le guide trace l'histoire de stringed des 
instruments aussi bien que l'histoire des concours de chaîne de 
caractères.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA faz um mapa do progresso dos 
concorrentes novos na competição 2003 da corda de Irving M. Klein 
Internacional enquanto vie para o $10.000 premiados grandes e de uma 
série de concerts prestigiosos. Este educador que a guia segue 
o history de stringed instrumentos as.well.as o history de 
competições da corda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA progetta il progresso dei competitori
giovani nella concorrenza 2003 della stringa di Irving M. Klein 
International mentre vie per il $10.000 grandi premiati e una serie di
concerti prestigious. Questo educatore che guida segue la storia
di stringed gli strumenti così come la storia dei concorsi della 
stringa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ σχεδιάζει την πρόοδο των νέων ανταγωνιστών
στο 2003 Irving M. Klein ανταγωνισμό International 
συμβολοσειράς δεδομένου ότι αυτοί vie για το μεγάλο βραβείο 
$10.000 και μια σειρά προσδιδουσών γόητρο συναυλιών. 
Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών επισημαίνει την ιστορία τα 
όργανα καθώς επίσης και η ιστορία των ανταγωνισμών 
συμβολοσειράς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA planea el progreso de los competidores 
jóvenes en la competición 2003 de la cadena de Irving M. Klein 
International como compiten para el $10.000 premiados magníficos y 
una serie de conciertos prestigiosos. Este educador que la guía
rastrea la historia de los instrumentos de cuerda así como la 
historia de las competiciones de la cadena.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205368</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
